How was your flight, Ma? Did you get any sleep?
Oh, same as usual, I was able to sleep a bit.
The kids have grown so much in 4 years!
Gosh, Ma, what do you have in here?
Did anyone help you at the airport?
OK! That should be everything!
Ah, Canada's scenery sure is beautiful...
